HarperAudio | 1991 | ISBN: 1559943513 | 1 Hour 13 Minutes | mp3 | 64,7 MB

This dynamic guide, from one of the world's foremost authorities on communication skills and image, offers listeners the key to speaking confidently, powerfully and persuasively in virtually every business situation. Whether you want to speak in front of a large audience, negotiate better or cope effectively with office politics, Dr. Glass will show you how to use your voice to best advantage.
